subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kyle Kuzma scored 21 points to lead the Utes past the No. 7 Blue Devils at the Ameritas Insurance Classic. Meanwhile, Anthony Gill finished with 22 points as the No. 8 Cavaliers held off the No. 12 Wildcats.
snippet: Kyle Kuzma scored 21 points to lead the Utes past the No. 7 Blue Devils at the Ameritas Insurance Classic. Meanwhile, Anthony Gill finished with 22 points as the No. 8 Cavaliers held off the No. 12 Wildcats.
